resources.string: Welcome to app. Press red camera to open reading from camera activity. Press yellow note to open voice notes. blue phone to make a phone call or add new contact. Press green calculator to open voice calculator and pink magnifier to check which font size is visible for you. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.

This view allows you to calculate simple math equations by speaking. Press the green circle and hold it until you stop telling your equation. It is required to use only two numbers in equation at once, so you cannot say for example four multiple six plus eight. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.

This view allows you to write and manage your own notes by speaking. On the top of the screen there are note titles that you have added before. Select the note you want to hear by pressing one of the note title. After selecting, press the green circle on the left to play the note. If you want to stop assistant to speak, press the red circle on the right. If you want to add a new note, press the yellow circle with plus sign. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.

This view allows you to find the text by using camera which you wish to be read by assistant. Selected area is defined by the red rectangle at the center of the camera. Hold the selected area at the text you want to be played. If there are problems with detecting the text, try to improve the focus or set the flashlight on. Press the green rounded button on the left to play the note. If you want to stop assistant to speak, press the red rounded button on the right. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.

This view allows you to call the contact from the list or add a new one by speaking. On the top of the screen there are contacts that you have added before, but at the beginning there is an empty area instead. Select the contact you want to call by pressing at one on the list. After selecting, press the big blue circle to call. If you want to add a new contact, press the green circle with plus sign and tell the assistant its number and name. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.

This view allows you to adjust the application font size. Scale the font size of the text at the center of the screen by pressing the green plus or blue minus circle. If the font is already visible for you, confirm it by pressing the purple circle on the bottom. Remember that you can always play this message again just by pressing the blue circle with question mark at the left top of the screen.
